basics.name: Keanu Reaño
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary:
I’m a full stack developer with experience building web applications using NextJS, Express, and TailwindCSS. I work on both frontend and backend tasks, creating solutions that are efficient and easy to maintain.

I’ve handled projects ranging from freelance work to full time roles, always focusing on delivering high-quality results. I enjoy solving technical challenges, automating workflows, and improving user experience.

work.name: Quantashift Software Development Services
work.summary:
● Built a full stack web app to help clients gain insights into content performance and audience engagement
● Developed the frontend using Next.js and TailwindCSS, ensuring a responsive and modern user experience.
● Implemented an Express.js backend with Firebase authentication and multiple API endpoints for data handling.
● Integrated ChatGPT API to deliver real-time chatbot functionality for interactive user support.
● Managed data storage with SQL, ensuring efficient and scalable handling of user data and analytics.
● Utilized Puppeteer for live data scraping, providing clients with insights into content interactions and engagement metrics.
work.location: Quezon City, National Capital Region, Philippines

work.name: Upwork
work.summary:
● Developed responsive websites using Next.js and Tailwind CSS, achieving consistently high client satisfaction.
● Built RESTful APIs using Node.js and Python, successfully meeting client project requirements.
● Created web scraping and analytics software with Python Selenium to help clients on decision-making processes.

work.name: Standard Insurance
work.summary:
● Developed RESTful API backend services with Java Spring Boot and PostgreSQL for Scrum meeting tracking.
● Coded frontend components based on UI design files using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
● Integrated session management and implemented JWT to improve authentication and authorization during API calls.

work.name: VideoHQ
work.summary:
● Built simple React.js websites and landing pages for clients, including social media landing pages and link trees.
● Developed Python automation tools to customize a secondary keyboard for faster video editing with macros.
● Created API tools that scrape and summarize data from platforms like Upwork and Reddit for easier client acquisition.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.summary:
● Made a portfolio website using Next.js and Tailwind CSS, showcasing professional experience, skills, and projects.
● Implemented GitHub Actions for CI/CD, ensuring automatic building and deployment with each push in the main branch.

projects.name: Git Auto Commit
projects.summary:
● Created an AI-based application that automatically creates Git commit messages based on code changes.
● Awarded Best in Thesis for outstanding innovation and practical real-world application.
